entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

urls.title: EA issues guidance on waste from lateral flow tests - letsrecycle.com
urls.description: The EA has prepared a document explaining how to collect and transfer Covid-19 lateral flow device wastes from mass-testing sites in England.

text:
PPE waste and lateral flow device test kit wastes are offensive healthcare wastes and should be handled in accordance with appropriate measures for permitted facilities. 

Stay updated on the latest guidance from the @EnvAgency here ‚¨áÔ∏è
https://t.co/4SHRUgecrO

urls.title: River pollution: Part of Wye fails environmental standards
urls.description: A PART of the River Wye is failing to meet environmental standards due to the level of phosphates in the water, according to a Welsh Government body.

text: The River Wye and the environment must have missed the memo on whether it is a failing SAC or not. C'mon @NatResWales and @EnvAgency let's get a plan implemented. The measurements are really quite simple. https://t.co/rG8eJqMVKq @WGEnviroAgri @CommonsEAC

urls.title: Surfers Against Sewage | Environmental charity tackling plastic pollution
urls.description: Surfers Against Sewage (SAS) is grassroots movement tackling plastic pollution and protecting the UK‚Äôs coastlines for all to enjoy safely and sustainably.

text:
@EnvAgency Water Companies Any Sewage leak, no matter how small, can be devastating for aquatic wildlife, and fish. After the recent cold weather now is a good time to check your Sewage Treatment Works for weakened joints and damaged underground pipes.
https://t.co/3b2sG3SIfi
